title: Chintz, 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants for black, 2 reds, and 2 purples applied by pen and brush. Madder dyed. Blue applied by brush. Yellow applied by brush (chintz).
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 37 x 61 cm (14 9/16 x 24 in.)
description: Red stripes with flowers alternate with white stripes with flowers and butterflies.

tombstone.epitaph:
Chintz, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants for black, 2 reds, and 2 purples applied by pen and brush. Madder dyed. Blue applied by brush. Yellow applied by brush (chintz).. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1973-51-25.
